survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Station Networks Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement regarding the usability, accessibility, and overall experience with public and private electric vehicle (EV) charging station networks.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Implement as checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging station networks?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging station networks?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors is most important to you when choosing an EV charging station?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to prioritize key factors influencing user decisions.
